TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Panama, title = Panama, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Panama} }

S.FORM: Panama hya' ga cyux maki' tay 9 00 N, 80 00 W na cung-Meco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 75,420 sq km (maki' tay 118ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 74,340 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 1,080 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 3,705,246. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 30.50% , lhlahuy hya' ga 43.60%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 25.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Panama City. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 3 na tay mawpuw qutux byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Juan Carlos Varela, aring ryax 1 squ byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2014 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Panama hya' ga cyox maki' tay 9 00 N, 80 00 W na cong-Meco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 75,420 sq km (maki' tay 118ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 74,340 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 1,080 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 3,705,246. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 30.50% , lhlahoy hya' ga 43.60%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 25.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Panama City. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 3 na tay mawpow qotox byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Joan Carlos Varela, aring ryax 1 sqo byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2014 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
